MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-APR-2021 16:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH55 postcode area of West Calder. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:00am due to a faulty pole box near Gavieside Nursery and Raeburn Cottages and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:00am on Thursday, 08 April 2021
